mapper.select: select count(*) count from SYYH_JCDB t where 1=1

sql.if: and t.NBJGH in ( select BR_NO from HBJYODS.JRJGXX m start with m.BR_NO = #{DataAuthNBJGH,jdbcType=VARCHAR } connect by m.SJGLJGNBJGH = prior m.BR_NO )

mapper.update:
update SYYH_JCDB t set
t.SJRQ = to_date(#{SJRQ,jdbcType=DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
t.JB_SJSj = to_date(#{JB_SJSJ,jdbcType=DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
t.JRJGBM = #{JRJGBM,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.NBJGH = #{NBJGH,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.SZQX = #{SZQX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.JB_ME = #{JB_ME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.JB_BB = #{JB_BB,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.JB_GZH = #{JB_GZH,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.JB_SL = #{JB_SL,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.JB_MEHJ = #{JB_MEHJ,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.JB_LY = #{JB_LY,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.CBR_NAME = #{CBR_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.CBR_SEX = #{CBR_SEX,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.CBR_ID = #{CBR_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.CBR_SJH = #{CBR_SJH,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.CBR_YHKH = #{CBR_YHKH,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.SBLX = #{SBLX,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.CODE = #{CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
t.BZXX = #{BZXX,jdbcType=VARCHAR } where
t.CODE = #{item.CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR }
mapper.delete:
delete from SYYH_JCDB t where 1=2
or t.CODE = #{item.CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR }
